body:
It would be better to fix the test (either by relaxing the test tolerance or improving the test in some other way).

Would you mind either:
a) changing the float16 tolerance (assertAllCloseAccordingToType allows a per-type tolerance override) to make the tests pass
or
b) adding a comment along the lines of
```
# TODO: test fails for float16 due to excessive precision requirements.
```
so it is clear why the test is disabled?
